name: @baloise/ui-library-docs
description: The Baloise Design-System is an open source project for styling awesome web applications that follow the Baloise corporate styling guidelines.

scripts.serve: npm run setup && vuepress dev src
scripts.build: npm run setup && vuepress build src
scripts.setup: npm run setup:copy && npm run setup:contributors && npm run setup:components && npm run setup:tooling
